title: EarCandy UI SFX PACK 1
description: Total 164 User Interface SFX: Crisp & Concise
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the soundS:

CLICK HERE


Elevate your app and game development with EarCandy UI SFX PACK 1, a meticulously curated collection of 164 high-quality sound effects. Designed for the discerning developer, this pack features an array of very soft, short, and tiny UI sound effects that will bring a delicate touch of sophistication to your user interface.


ShortTone: These are the subtle clicks, pops, and dings with minimal sustain, perfect for immediate feedback without overwhelming the user experience.


LongTone: For notifications that need to linger just a bit longer, like bell alerts, these sounds have a relatively longer sustain, ensuring they’re noticed but not intrusive.


MultiTone: Comprising two or more melodic notes, these quick tune mnemonics are ideal for memorable alerts and actions, adding a layer of engagement to your UI.


Every sound in the EarCandy UI SFX PACK 1 is unique, ensuring your project stands out. The sounds are ready to be implemented into your game design workflow, saving you time and effort in post-production.


Whether you’re developing a sleek mobile app or an immersive game, these sound effects are designed to integrate seamlessly, enhancing the user’s tactile interaction with your product. With EarCandy UI SFX PACK 1, you’re not just buying sound effects; you’re investing in an auditory experience that will delight your users and elevate your brand.

Only the pack's image is CreatedWithAI
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  ShortTone SFX
  •  MultiTone SFX
  •  LongTone SFX
  • Wav files

Number of Audio Waves: 164

Number of Audio Cues: 164

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Extra silence from the start and end of each file is removed. One more sound is added making a total of 164 audio files.
